name: Presentation.io
overview:
Presentation.io lets you stay in sync with your audience. As the presenter, you can sync your presentations to the mobile devices, tablets and laptops of your audience - no matter whether you are in the same room or in different parts of the world. You just hand out the direct link and everyone connected will be able to follow the slides live on his or her own device and interact with real-time comments and chat during or after the presentation.

Over 20 different file types are supported and it will work in any browser, just hand out the link and the audience is connected; no need to download an app, or log into any system.
